RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup

RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup Class Reference

#include <environmentsetup.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Creates the Ogre environment for the game/editor.

It creates a suitable SceneManager, the Camera and so on. The Ogre renderWindow must be created before using this class because the render window creation is different for GameEngine and OgreView.

Member Function Documentation

void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::createSceneManager (  ) 

Creates a Ogre SceneManager with a custom name.

The type of the SceneManager is PagingLandScapeSceneManager.

void RainbruRPG::Core::EnvironmentSetup::treatObjectMesh ( ObjectMesh *  om  )  [private]

Treats an ObjectMesh.

The position of the given ObjectMesh will be add to the current scene manager using the addMesh function
